trans-unit.source: Along with our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, this Policy provides you with information about the cookies and other similar technologies that are used by all of our websites, mobile apps and other services. We'll review this policy from time to time to make sure it's up-to-date. If we make changes, we'll post the latest version here. When we make significant changes, we'll let you know when you next access our services, or by other communications.

seg-source.mrk: Along with our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, this Policy provides you with information about the cookies and other similar technologies that are used by all of our websites, mobile apps and other services. We'll review this policy from time to time to make sure it's up-to-date. If we make changes, we'll post the latest version here. When we make significant changes, we'll let you know when you next access our services, or by other communications.

target.mrk: Em conjunto com nossos Termos de Servio e Poltica de Privacidade, esta Poltica traz informaes sobre cookies e outras tecnologias semelhantes que so usadas por todos os nossos sites, aplicativos para celular e outros servios. Revisaremos esta poltica periodicamente para garantir que ela esteja atualizada. Se fizermos alteraes, publicaremos a verso mais recente aqui. Quando fizermos alteraes importantes, informaremos da prxima vez que voc acessar nossos servios ou por outros meios de comunicao.

trans-unit.source: This cookie policy does not apply in the United States of America. The US privacy policy is available at Privacy Policy

file.mtc:id-order: How can I withdraw my consent to the use of cookies and similar technologies?

trans-unit.source: How can I withdraw my consent to the use of cookies and similar technologies?

seg-source.mrk: How can I withdraw my consent to the use of cookies and similar technologies?

target.mrk: Como posso revogar minha autorizao do uso de cookies e tecnologias semelhantes?

trans-unit.source: When you access our services for the first time on your device, we ask you to agree to us using cookies and similar technologies in line with this policy. If you don't agree to our use of these technologies, or you change your mind at a later date, you can withdraw your consent using the methods set out in this Policy or alternatively, stop using our services.

seg-source.mrk: When you access our services for the first time on your device, we ask you to agree to us using cookies and similar technologies in line with this policy. If you don't agree to our use of these technologies, or you change your mind at a later date, you can withdraw your consent using the methods set out in this Policy or alternatively, stop using our services.

target.mrk: Quando voc acessa nossos servios pela primeira vez no seu dispositivo, pedimos que voc concorde com o uso de cookies e tecnologias semelhantes de acordo com esta poltica. Se voc no concordar com o uso dessas tecnologias ou mudar de ideia em uma data posterior, poder retirar sua autorizao usando os mtodos estabelecidos nesta Poltica ou, alternativamente, parar de usar nossos servios.

file.mtc:id-order: How do we use cookies and similar technologies?

trans-unit.source: How do we use cookies and similar technologies?

seg-source.mrk: How do we use cookies and similar technologies?

target.mrk: Como usamos cookies e tecnologias semelhantes?

trans-unit.source: We use cookies and similar technologies when you use our services, including the mobile app (App) and the Skyscanner website (such as skyscanner.net) (Website) (together, our Platforms). These are controlled either by us or directly by third parties acting on our behalf or independently.

seg-source.mrk: We use cookies and similar technologies when you use our services, including the mobile app (App) and the Skyscanner website (such as skyscanner.net) (Website) (together, our Platforms). These are controlled either by us or directly by third parties acting on our behalf or independently.

target.mrk: Usamos cookies e tecnologias semelhantes quando voc usa nossos servios, incluindo o aplicativo para celular ("Aplicativo") e o site do Skyscanner (como skyscanner.net) ("Site") (em conjunto, nossas "Plataformas"). Eles so controlados por ns ou diretamente por terceiros que atuam em nosso nome ou de forma independente.

file.mtc:id-order: Learn more about cookies and similar technologies

trans-unit.source: Learn more about cookies and similar technologies

seg-source.mrk: Learn more about cookies and similar technologies

target.mrk: Saiba mais sobre cookies e tecnologias semelhantes

trans-unit.source: What are cookies and similar technologies?

seg-source.mrk: What are cookies and similar technologies?

target.mrk: O que so cookies e tecnologias semelhantes?

trans-unit.source:
A cookie is a small text file which is placed on your device (e.g computer or smartphone), via your web browser, at the request of the websites you visit or applications you use and which stores information on your device for a limited period of time. Cookies allow Skyscanner to recognise you and your device each time you visit Skyscanner.
Some of the cookies we use are removed as soon you leave our Website or App, because we don't need to store this information between visits. By contrast, 'persistent' cookies enable our services or tags to recognise you when you make return visits to us, and automatically expire when they reach a specified expiry date unless you delete them earlier. Persistent cookies placed on your device by Skyscanner will never be stored for longer than 2 years from the date of your last visit. There are tools available to check the expiry date on cookies, and this functionality may be provided by your browser.
We may also use similar technologies referred to as 'tags', 'tracking pixels', 'code snippets', 'tracking URLs', 'local storage' and 'scripts' as well as 'software development kits' (SDKs) and 'device identifiers' in our apps. These technologies are implemented on our services and may be used together with text cookies to enable information to be stored on, or transmitted to and from, the device you use to access Skyscanner.
In this policy we collectively refer to all of these app and web technologies as cookies and similar technologies.
We may from time to time add, remove or update the cookies and web technologies we use across our services.

seg-source.mrk:
A cookie is a small text file which is placed on your device (e.g computer or smartphone), via your web browser, at the request of the websites you visit or applications you use and which stores information on your device for a limited period of time. Cookies allow Skyscanner to recognise you and your device each time you visit Skyscanner.
Some of the cookies we use are removed as soon you leave our Website or App, because we don't need to store this information between visits. By contrast, 'persistent' cookies enable our services or tags to recognise you when you make return visits to us, and automatically expire when they reach a specified expiry date unless you delete them earlier. Persistent cookies placed on your device by Skyscanner will never be stored for longer than 2 years from the date of your last visit. There are tools available to check the expiry date on cookies, and this functionality may be provided by your browser.
We may also use similar technologies referred to as 'tags', 'tracking pixels', 'code snippets', 'tracking URLs', 'local storage' and 'scripts' as well as 'software development kits' (SDKs) and 'device identifiers' in our apps. These technologies are implemented on our services and may be used together with text cookies to enable information to be stored on, or transmitted to and from, the device you use to access Skyscanner.
In this policy we collectively refer to all of these app and web technologies as cookies and similar technologies.
We may from time to time add, remove or update the cookies and web technologies we use across our services.

target.mrk:
Um cookie um pequeno arquivo de texto que colocado no seu dispositivo (por exemplo, computador ou smartphone), por meio do seu navegador, a pedido dos sites que voc visita ou aplicativos que usa e que armazena informaes no seu dispositivo por um perodo limitado. Os cookies permitem que o Skyscanner reconhea voc e seu dispositivo sempre que voc visitar o Skyscanner.
Alguns dos cookies que usamos so removidos assim que voc sai do nosso Site ou Aplicativo, porque no precisamos armazenar essas informaes entre as visitas. Por outro lado, os cookies "persistentes" permitem que nossos servios ou tags reconheam voc quando voc faz visitas de retorno e expiram automaticamente quando atingem uma data de validade especificada, a menos que voc os exclua antes. Os cookies persistentes colocados no seu dispositivo pelo Skyscanner nunca sero armazenados por mais de 2 anos a partir da data da sua ltima visita. Existem ferramentas disponveis para verificar a data de validade dos cookies, e essa funcionalidade pode ser fornecida pelo seu navegador.
Tambm podemos usar tecnologias semelhantes chamadas "tags", "pixels de rastreamento", "trechos de cdigo", "URLs de rastreamento", "armazenamento local" e "scripts", bem como "kits de desenvolvimento de software" ("SDKs") e "identificadores de dispositivos" em nossos aplicativos. Essas tecnologias so implementadas em nossos servios e podem ser usadas em conjunto com cookies de texto para permitir que as informaes sejam armazenadas ou transmitidas de e para o dispositivo que voc usa para acessar o Skyscanner.
Nesta poltica, nos referimos coletivamente a todas essas tecnologias de aplicativos e web como "cookies e tecnologias semelhantes".
Podemos, de tempos em tempos, adicionar, remover ou atualizar os cookies e tecnologias da web que usamos em nossos servios.

trans-unit.source: You can view the main cookies and similar technologies we use at the date of this Policy in the What cookies and similar technologies do we use and how can you opt out of them? section of this Policy.

seg-source.mrk: You can view the main cookies and similar technologies we use at the date of this Policy in the What cookies and similar technologies do we use and how can you opt out of them? section of this Policy.

target.mrk: Voc pode ver os principais cookies e tecnologias semelhantes que usamos na data desta Poltica na seo Quais cookies e tecnologias semelhantes usamos e como voc pode desativ-los? desta Poltica.

trans-unit.source: Purpose of essential cookies or similar technologies

seg-source.mrk: Purpose of essential cookies or similar technologies

target.mrk: Finalidade dos cookies essenciais ou tecnologias semelhantes

trans-unit.source: These cookies and similar technologies collect essential data in order to ensure that the Website and App function properly. You cannot opt out of these Cookies, because without them Skyscanner wouldn't work. Skyscanner uses these for the following purposes:

seg-source.mrk: These cookies and similar technologies collect essential data in order to ensure that the Website and App function properly. You cannot opt out of these Cookies, because without them Skyscanner wouldn't work. Skyscanner uses these for the following purposes:

target.mrk: Esses cookies e tecnologias semelhantes coletam dados essenciais para garantir que o Site e o Aplicativo funcionem corretamente. Voc no pode desativar esses Cookies, porque sem eles o Skyscanner no funcionaria. O Skyscanner os usa para as seguintes finalidades:

trans-unit.source: recognise whether you are a first-time visitor or a return visitor to our Website and to tailor the presentation of our services, such as by recalling your language and currency preferences or your most recent searches;

seg-source.mrk: recognise whether you are a first-time visitor or a return visitor to our Website and to tailor the presentation of our services, such as by recalling your language and currency preferences or your most recent searches;

target.mrk: reconhecer se voc um visitante de primeira viagem ou um visitante de retorno ao nosso Site e personalizar a apresentao de nossos servios, como lembrar suas preferncias de idioma e moeda ou suas buscas mais recentes;

trans-unit.source: to record whether or not you complete a booking with a Travel Provider that you have been redirected to via our Platforms;

seg-source.mrk: to record whether or not you complete a booking with a Travel Provider that you have been redirected to via our Platforms;

target.mrk: registrar se voc concluiu ou no uma reserva com um Fornecedor de viagem para o qual foi redirecionado por meio de nossas Plataformas;

trans-unit.source: provide functionality such as trip planning based on bookings on Skyscanner and our Travel Providers' sites;

seg-source.mrk: provide functionality such as trip planning based on bookings on Skyscanner and our Travel Providers' sites;

target.mrk: fornecer funcionalidades como planejamento de viagens com base em reservas no Skyscanner e nos sites de nossos Fornecedores de viagens;

trans-unit.source: remember information that is essential to determining how your search results are displayed, such as your language and currency preferences or the product features we make available to you based on factors such as the device you are using, or your city or country level geographic location;

seg-source.mrk: remember information that is essential to determining how your search results are displayed, such as your language and currency preferences or the product features we make available to you based on factors such as the device you are using, or your city or country level geographic location;

target.mrk: lembrar informaes essenciais para determinar como seus resultados de busca so exibidos, como suas preferncias de idioma e moeda ou os recursos do produto que disponibilizamos para voc com base em fatores como o dispositivo que voc est usando ou sua localizao geogrfica no nvel da cidade ou do pas;

trans-unit.source: remember your search criteria such as routes, dates and the number of travellers - as you move between pages and to pass this information to the travel suppliers that you redirect to from Skyscanner, or to send you to specific places within our Platforms;

seg-source.mrk: remember your search criteria such as routes, dates and the number of travellers - as you move between pages and to pass this information to the travel suppliers that you redirect to from Skyscanner, or to send you to specific places within our Platforms;

target.mrk: lembrar seus critrios de busca, como rotas, datas e nmero de viajantes, medida que voc se movimenta entre as pginas e para passar essas informaes para os fornecedores de viagem para os quais voc redireciona a partir do Skyscanner, ou para enviar voc para lugares especficos dentro de nossas Plataformas;

trans-unit.source: gather important information about how our products and services are used which influence vital product decisions, updates and changes and the features we make available in certain markets;

seg-source.mrk: gather important information about how our products and services are used which influence vital product decisions, updates and changes and the features we make available in certain markets;

target.mrk: reunir informaes importantes sobre como nossos produtos e servios so usados, o que influencia decises, atualizaes e alteraes vitais de produtos e os recursos que disponibilizamos em determinados mercados;

trans-unit.source: ensure our services are secure from automated agents, bots and fraudulent activity; and

seg-source.mrk: ensure our services are secure from automated agents, bots and fraudulent activity; and

target.mrk: garantir que nossos servios estejam protegidos contra agentes automatizados, bots e atividades fraudulentas; e

trans-unit.source: provide login functionality and customer support services.

seg-source.mrk: provide login functionality and customer support services.

target.mrk: fornecer funcionalidade de login e servios de suporte ao cliente.

trans-unit.source: Some of these essential cookies and similar technologies will be provided by a third-party. For more information on these essential technologies maintained by Skyscanner and third-parties please see the 'Skyscanner Essential Cookies and Similar Technologies' and 'Third-Party Essential Cookies and Similar Technologies' section of this Policy.

seg-source.mrk: Some of these essential cookies and similar technologies will be provided by a third-party. For more information on these essential technologies maintained by Skyscanner and third-parties please see the 'Skyscanner Essential Cookies and Similar Technologies' and 'Third-Party Essential Cookies and Similar Technologies' section of this Policy.

target.mrk: Alguns desses cookies essenciais e tecnologias semelhantes sero fornecidos por terceiros. Para obter mais informaes sobre essas tecnologias essenciais mantidas pelo Skyscanner e por terceiros, consulte a seo "Cookies essenciais e tecnologias semelhantes do Skyscanner" e "Cookies essenciais e tecnologias semelhantes de terceiros" desta Poltica.

trans-unit.source: Purpose of improved experience (analytics) cookies or similar technologies

seg-source.mrk: Purpose of improved experience (analytics) cookies or similar technologies

target.mrk: Finalidade dos cookies de experincia aprimorada (anlise) ou tecnologias semelhantes

trans-unit.source:
Analytics cookies and similar technologies allow Skyscanner to collect information about how visitors interact with our Platforms. Skyscanner uses the information collected from these analytics cookies and similar technologies to inform reports on our Platforms' usage. This information will assist Skyscanner in measuring and improving the performance of our Platforms.
Skyscanner uses analytics cookies and similar technologies to collect information about how individuals engage with our Platforms. This information is used for reporting to assist us in improving the Skyscanner service, analyse and measure product improvements and guide our product development teams based on your activities.
Your data is stored or accessed via cookies and similar technologies that are used to optimise your experience of our Platforms. Without them, our Platforms would feel a lot less easy to use and you would not benefit from the best experience.These cookies and similar technologies help improve your experience by allowing us to:

seg-source.mrk:
Analytics cookies and similar technologies allow Skyscanner to collect information about how visitors interact with our Platforms. Skyscanner uses the information collected from these analytics cookies and similar technologies to inform reports on our Platforms' usage. This information will assist Skyscanner in measuring and improving the performance of our Platforms.
Skyscanner uses analytics cookies and similar technologies to collect information about how individuals engage with our Platforms. This information is used for reporting to assist us in improving the Skyscanner service, analyse and measure product improvements and guide our product development teams based on your activities.
Your data is stored or accessed via cookies and similar technologies that are used to optimise your experience of our Platforms. Without them, our Platforms would feel a lot less easy to use and you would not benefit from the best experience.These cookies and similar technologies help improve your experience by allowing us to:

target.mrk:
Os cookies de anlise e tecnologias semelhantes permitem que o Skyscanner colete informaes sobre como os visitantes interagem com nossas Plataformas. O Skyscanner usa essas informaes coletadas para alimentar relatrios sobre o uso de nossas Plataformas. Essas informaes ajudaro o Skyscanner a medir e aprimorar o desempenho de nossas Plataformas.
O Skyscanner usa cookies de anlise e tecnologias semelhantes para coletar informaes sobre como os indivduos se envolvem com nossas Plataformas. Essas informaes so usadas para relatrios para nos ajudar a melhorar o servio do Skyscanner, analisar e medir melhorias de produtos e orientar nossas equipes de desenvolvimento de produtos com base em suas atividades.
Seus dados so armazenados ou acessados por meio de cookies e tecnologias semelhantes que so usados para otimizar sua experincia em nossas Plataformas. Sem eles, nossas Plataformas seriam muito menos fceis de usar e voc no se beneficiaria da melhor experincia. Esses cookies e tecnologias semelhantes ajudam a melhorar sua experincia, permitindo-nos:

trans-unit.source: recognise you when you access our Platforms from different devices, to provide you with a better experience; and

seg-source.mrk: recognise you when you access our Platforms from different devices, to provide you with a better experience; and

target.mrk: reconhec-lo quando voc acessa nossas Plataformas a partir de diferentes dispositivos, para oferecer uma melhor experincia; e

trans-unit.source: monitor, test, and understand more about how our services are discovered, used and accessed such as the app store you used to download our App onto your device, and whether you downloaded our App after clicking on an ad.

seg-source.mrk: monitor, test, and understand more about how our services are discovered, used and accessed such as the app store you used to download our App onto your device, and whether you downloaded our App after clicking on an ad.

target.mrk: monitorar, testar e entender mais sobre como nossos servios so descobertos, usados e acessados, como a loja de aplicativos que voc usou para baixar nosso Aplicativo no seu dispositivo e se voc baixou nosso Aplicativo depois de clicar em um anncio.

trans-unit.source: These Cookies help us to make decisions about how best to develop or deliver our product to meet your needs. You can opt out of the use of these Cookies on your device by following the instructions in the How can I withdraw my consent to the use of cookies and similar technologies? section of this Policy.

seg-source.mrk: These Cookies help us to make decisions about how best to develop or deliver our product to meet your needs. You can opt out of the use of these Cookies on your device by following the instructions in the How can I withdraw my consent to the use of cookies and similar technologies? section of this Policy.

target.mrk: Esses cookies nos ajudam a tomar decises sobre a melhor forma de desenvolver ou fornecer nosso produto para atender s suas necessidades. Voc pode desativar o uso desses cookies no seu dispositivo seguindo as instrues na seo Como posso revogar minha autorizao do uso de cookies e tecnologias semelhantes? desta Poltica.

trans-unit.source: Purpose of personalised adverts (including third party ad solutions) cookies or similar technologies

seg-source.mrk: Purpose of personalised adverts (including third party ad solutions) cookies or similar technologies

target.mrk: Finalidade dos cookies de anncios personalizados (incluindo solues de anncios de terceiros) ou tecnologias semelhantes

trans-unit.source:
When you are opted-in to ads or offers personalisation we may also use information we collect via cookies and similar technologies to show you personalised ads, marketing, offers and promotions on Skyscanner, or to send you electronic direct marketing communications where you have opted in to receive these. For example, where you book a hotel using our Website or App or redirect from our Website or App to make a booking with a Travel Provider, we may use the information we collect via cookies and similar technologies to personalise the ads we show you or to send you personalised marketing communications relevant to your booking based on information like your destination, the time you are travelling, the services you've selected or which travel supplier you are travelling with. We may also use this information to provide you with relevant information about the destination you are travelling to such as destination information, up-to-date weather information or to request reviews and recommendations about the places you have visited.
These cookies and similar technologies help Skyscanner and our marketing service providers to improve and measure the success of some advertising campaigns to ensure that you are only shown ads which are relevant to you and to avoid showing you ads you have already seen.
You can opt-out of your information being used by Skyscanner for ads and offers personalisation by following the steps set out in the How can I withdraw my consent to the use of cookies and similar technologies? section of this Policy below.
When you opt out, we'll stop using these cookies to learn more about you, so you won't see as personalised ads, offers or marketing while you are on the Website or the App when you opt out. However, you'll continue to see advertising or offers when you're on the Website or the App based on contextual information on the page or screen you are viewing. For example, if you have searched for a flight to London then you may be shown an advert relating to a hotel in London within that webpage.
You can find out more about the advertising on Skyscanner in the How is your information used for advertising? section of the Policy.
We use technologies to personalise ads in certain platforms. When you are opted-in to ads personalisation on these platforms, we transfer information such as the travel you have searched for or purchased using Skyscanner, the dates you want to travel and the features you have interacted with to providers such as Facebook, Google and TikTok (Third Party Ad Solutions) for the purpose of customising, optimising and improving the relevance of the advertisements you see across the web via the Third Party Ad Solution's advertising network.
When we transfer information to Third Party Ad Solution providers like Facebook, Google and TikTok we do so using the tools they provide. They may in addition use that information to personalise features and content (including advertisements and recommendations) you see on their networks, to optimise delivery of advertisements and for research and development purposes in accordance with their policies (see for example the Facebook Privacy Policy, and TikTok Privacy Policy).
The majority of these adverts will be personalised to make them relevant to you and will fall into two different categories. Firstly, adverts that are personalised for you based on information collected by us or by Third Party Ad Solutions whilst you use our services, such as your general location (by city or country) and your Skyscanner searches or booking history (Skyscanner-related Information). So, for example, if you've booked a flight to Rome, you'll see adverts about hotels in Rome, rather than hotels in Paris (Paris is lovely, but this could be a bit annoying!). Skyscanner-related Information will never include your name, contact details or other information that would enable you to be identified in the offline world. Secondly, adverts that are personalised for you based on information that we have no visibility or control over, and which is instead collected from you by non-Skyscanner Platforms when you have been using other non-Skyscanner websites or platforms. (non-Skyscanner Platforms). Collectively, we refer to these as interest-based advertisements.
The information required to deliver these interest-based advertisements will be stored by non-Skyscanner Platforms alongside your IP address and/or a cookie ID, so that you can be served the adverts without the non-Skyscanner Platforms needing to store any information that would enable you to be identified in the offline world, like your name or address.
When you are opted-in to ads personalisation we may also use information we collect via cookies and similar technologies to show you personalised ads, marketing and promotions on Skyscanner, or to send you communications where you have opted in to receive these. For example, where you book a flight using Skyscanner or redirect from Skyscanner to make a booking on one of our partner sites, we may use the information we collect via cookies and similar technologies to personalise the ads we show you or to send you personalised marketing communications relevant to your booking based on information like your destination, the time you are travelling, the services you've selected or which travel supplier you are travelling with.
You can opt-out of your information being used for ads personalisation by non-Skyscanner Platforms by following the steps set out in the How can I withdraw my consent to the use of cookies and similar technologies? section of this Policy below.
When you opt out of ads personalisation, this will stop your information being used for advertising purposes by any of the Third Party Ad Solutions we use. You will not receive personalised advertisements from those non-Skyscanner Platforms on the Skyscanner Website or App, or elsewhere as you move around the web. You will still receive advertisements, which will not be customised to your interests. Please note that any such opt-out of interest-based adverts will take some time to reflect within your browsing sessions, as Skyscanner will need to facilitate such a request.

seg-source.mrk:
When you are opted-in to ads or offers personalisation we may also use information we collect via cookies and similar technologies to show you personalised ads, marketing, offers and promotions on Skyscanner, or to send you electronic direct marketing communications where you have opted in to receive these. For example, where you book a hotel using our Website or App or redirect from our Website or App to make a booking with a Travel Provider, we may use the information we collect via cookies and similar technologies to personalise the ads we show you or to send you personalised marketing communications relevant to your booking based on information like your destination, the time you are travelling, the services you've selected or which travel supplier you are travelling with. We may also use this information to provide you with relevant information about the destination you are travelling to such as destination information, up-to-date weather information or to request reviews and recommendations about the places you have visited.

When you opt out, we'll stop using these cookies to learn more about you, so you won't see as personalised ads, offers or marketing while you are on the Website or the App when you opt out. However, you'll continue to see advertising or offers when you're on the Website or the App based on contextual information on the page or screen you are viewing. When you are opted-in to ads personalisation on these platforms, we transfer information such as the travel you have searched for or purchased using Skyscanner, the dates you want to travel and the features you have interacted with to providers such as Facebook, Google and TikTok (Third Party Ad Solutions) for the purpose of customising, optimising and improving the relevance of the advertisements you see across the web via the Third Party Ad Solution's advertising network.

The majority of these adverts will be personalised to make them relevant to you and will fall into two different categories. Firstly, adverts that are personalised for you based on information collected by us or by Third Party Ad Solutions whilst you use our services, such as your general location (by city or country) and your Skyscanner searches or booking history (Skyscanner-related Information). So, for example, if you've booked a flight to Rome, you'll see adverts about hotels in Rome, rather than hotels in Paris (Paris is lovely, but this could be a bit annoying!). Skyscanner-related Information will never include your name, contact details or other information that would enable you to be identified in the offline world. Secondly, adverts that are personalised for you based on information that we have no visibility or control over, and which is instead collected from you by non-Skyscanner Platforms when you have been using other non-Skyscanner websites or platforms. (non-Skyscanner Platforms). Collectively, we refer to these as interest-based advertisements.
The information required to deliver these interest-based advertisements will be stored by non-Skyscanner Platforms alongside your IP address and/or a cookie ID, so that you can be served the adverts without the non-Skyscanner Platforms needing to store any information that would enable you to be identified in the offline world, like your name or address.
When you are opted-in to ads personalisation we may also use information we collect via cookies and similar technologies to show you personalised ads, marketing and promotions on Skyscanner, or to send you communications where you have opted in to receive these. For example, where you book a flight using Skyscanner or redirect from Skyscanner to make a booking on one of our partner sites, we may use the information we collect via cookies and similar technologies to personalise the ads we show you or to send you personalised marketing communications relevant to your booking based on information like your destination, the time you are travelling, the services you've selected or which travel supplier you are travelling with.
You can opt-out of your information being used for ads personalisation by non-Skyscanner Platforms by following the steps set out in the How can I withdraw my consent to the use of cookies and similar technologies? section of this Policy below.
When you opt out of ads personalisation, this will stop your information being used for advertising purposes by any of the Third Party Ad Solutions we use. You will not receive personalised advertisements from those non-Skyscanner Platforms on the Skyscanner Website or App, or elsewhere as you move around the web. You will still receive advertisements, which will not be customised to your interests. Please note that any such opt-out of interest-based adverts will take some time to reflect within your browsing sessions, as Skyscanner will need to facilitate such a request.

target.mrk:
Quando voc concorda com a personalizao de anncios ou ofertas, tambm podemos usar as informaes que coletamos por meio de cookies e tecnologias semelhantes para exibir anncios, marketing, ofertas e promoes personalizados no Skyscanner ou para enviar comunicaes eletrnicas de marketing direto quando voc tiver optado por receb-las. Por exemplo, quando voc reserva um hotel usando nosso Site ou Aplicativo ou redirecionado do nosso Site ou Aplicativo para fazer uma reserva com um Fornecedor de Viagens, podemos usar as informaes que coletamos por meio de cookies e tecnologias semelhantes para personalizar os anncios que exibimos ou para enviar comunicaes de marketing personalizadas relevantes para sua reserva com base em informaes como seu destino, o horrio em que voc est viajando, os servios que voc selecionou ou com qual fornecedor de viagens voc est viajando. Tambm podemos usar essas informaes para fornecer informaes relevantes sobre o destino para o qual voc est viajando, como informaes sobre o destino, informaes meteorolgicas atualizadas ou para solicitar avaliaes e recomendaes sobre os lugares que voc visitou.
Esses cookies e tecnologias semelhantes ajudam o Skyscanner e nossos fornecedores de servios de marketing a melhorar e medir o sucesso de algumas campanhas de publicidade para garantir que voc s veja anncios relevantes e para evitar exibir anncios que voc j viu.
Voc pode optar por no permitir que suas informaes sejam usadas pelo Skyscanner para personalizao de anncios e ofertas seguindo as etapas estabelecidas na seo "Como posso retirar meu consentimento para o uso de cookies e tecnologias semelhantes?" desta Poltica abaixo.
Quando voc optar por no participar, deixaremos de usar esses cookies para saber mais sobre voc, para que voc no veja anncios, ofertas ou marketing personalizados enquanto estiver no Site ou no Aplicativo. No entanto, voc continuar a ver anncios ou ofertas quando estiver no Site ou no Aplicativo com base em informaes contextuais na pgina ou tela que estiver visualizando. Por exemplo, se voc buscou um voo para Londres, poder ver um anncio relacionado a um hotel em Londres nessa pgina da web.
Voc pode saber mais sobre a publicidade no Skyscanner na seo "Como suas informaes so usadas para publicidade?" da Poltica.
Usamos tecnologias para personalizar anncios em determinadas plataformas. Quando voc concorda com a personalizao de anncios nessas plataformas, transferimos informaes, como a viagem buscada ou adquirida usando o Skyscanner, as datas em que voc deseja viajar e os recursos com os quais interagiu para fornecedores como Facebook, Google e TikTok ("Solues Terceirizadas de Publicidade"), com o propsito de personalizar, otimizar e aprimorar a relevncia dos anncios exibidos na web por meio da rede de anncios dessas Solues Terceirizadas de Publicidade.
Quando transferimos informaes para fornecedores de Solues Terceirizadas de Publicidade, como Facebook, Google e TikTok, fazemos isso usando as ferramentas que eles fornecem. Alm disso, eles podem usar essas informaes para personalizar recursos e contedo (incluindo anncios e recomendaes) exibidos nas redes deles para otimizar a entrega de anncios e para fins de pesquisa e desenvolvimento, de acordo com a poltica de privacidade deles (como exemplo, consulte a Poltica de Privacidade do Facebook e a Poltica de Privacidade do TikTok).
A maioria desses anncios ser personalizada para torn-los relevantes para voc e se enquadrar em duas categorias diferentes. Em primeiro lugar, anncios personalizados para voc com base em informaes coletadas por ns ou por Solues Terceirizadas de Publicidade enquanto voc usa nossos servios, como sua localizao geral (por cidade ou pas) e suas buscas ou histrico de reservas no Skyscanner ("Informaes relacionadas ao Skyscanner"). Por exemplo, se voc reservou um voo para Roma, ver anncios sobre hotis em Roma, em vez de hotis em Paris (Paris adorvel, mas isso pode ser um pouco irritante!). As Informaes relacionadas ao Skyscanner nunca incluiro seu nome, informaes de contato ou outras informaes que permitam que voc seja identificado no mundo offline. Em segundo lugar, anncios personalizados para voc com base em informaes sobre as quais no temos visibilidade ou controle e que so coletadas de voc por Plataformas No do Skyscanner quando voc usa outros sites ou plataformas que no so do Skyscanner ("Plataformas No do Skyscanner"). Coletivamente, nos referimos a eles como anncios "baseados em interesses".
As informaes necessrias para fornecer esses anncios baseados em interesses sero armazenadas por Plataformas que no so do Skyscanner juntamente com seu endereo de IP e/ou um ID de cookie, para que voc possa receber os anncios sem que as Plataformas que no so do Skyscanner precisem armazenar qualquer informao que permita que voc seja identificado no mundo offline, como seu nome ou endereo.
Quando voc concorda com a personalizao de anncios, tambm podemos usar as informaes que coletamos por meio de cookies e tecnologias semelhantes para exibir anncios personalizados, marketing e promoes no Skyscanner ou para enviar comunicaes quando voc tiver optado por receb-las. Por exemplo, quando voc reserva um voo usando o Skyscanner ou redirecionado do Skyscanner para fazer uma reserva em um de nossos sites parceiros, podemos usar as informaes que coletamos por meio de cookies e tecnologias semelhantes para personalizar os anncios que exibimos ou para enviar comunicaes de marketing personalizadas relevantes para sua reserva com base em informaes como seu destino, o horrio em que voc est viajando, os servios que voc selecionou ou com qual fornecedor de viagens voc est viajando.
Voc pode optar por no permitir que suas informaes sejam usadas para personalizao de anncios por Plataformas que no so do Skyscanner seguindo as etapas estabelecidas na seo "Como posso revogar meu consentimento para o uso de cookies e tecnologias semelhantes?" desta Poltica abaixo.
Quando voc opta por no personalizar anncios, isso impede que suas informaes sejam usadas para fins de publicidade por qualquer uma das Solues Terceirizadas de Publicidade que usamos. Voc no receber anncios personalizados dessas Plataformas que no so do Skyscanner no Site ou no Aplicativo do Skyscanner, ou em outro lugar enquanto navega na web. Voc ainda receber anncios, que no sero personalizados de acordo com seus interesses. Observe que qualquer desativao de anncios com base em interesses levar algum tempo para ser refletida nas suas sesses de navegao, pois o Skyscanner precisar facilitar essa solicitao.

trans-unit.source: Who controls these cookies and similar technologies?

seg-source.mrk: Who controls these cookies and similar technologies?

target.mrk: Quem controla esses cookies e tecnologias semelhantes?

trans-unit.source: The cookies and similar technologies on our services are controlled either by us directly or by third parties acting on our behalf. There are also some cookies and similar technologies which we've implemented for advertising purposes that are controlled by independent third parties. You can find out more about these third parties and how to opt-out of their cookies in the What Cookies and similar technologies do we use and how can you opt out of them? section of this Policy.

seg-source.mrk: The cookies and similar technologies on our services are controlled either by us directly or by third parties acting on our behalf. There are also some cookies and similar technologies which we've implemented for advertising purposes that are controlled by independent third parties. You can find out more about these third parties and how to opt-out of their cookies in the What Cookies and similar technologies do we use and how can you opt out of them? section of this Policy.

target.mrk: Os cookies e tecnologias semelhantes em nossos servios so controlados diretamente por ns ou por terceiros que atuam em nosso nome. Tambm existem alguns cookies e tecnologias semelhantes que implementamos para fins de publicidade que so controlados por terceiros independentes. Voc pode saber mais sobre esses terceiros e como desativar seus cookies na seo "Quais cookies e tecnologias semelhantes usamos e como voc pode desativ-los?" desta Poltica.

trans-unit.source: Adverts you might see while using non-Skyscanner Platforms

seg-source.mrk: Adverts you might see while using non-Skyscanner Platforms

target.mrk: Anncios que voc pode ver ao usar as plataformas Skyscanner

trans-unit.source:
You might see personalised adverts for Skyscanner or selected Skyscanner partners once you've left the Skyscanner Website or App and are using non-Skyscanner platforms. These adverts may be personalised and served to you based on the information Skyscanner and non-Skyscanner Platforms have collected about you. For example, if you have searched for a flight from Edinburgh to London on Skyscanner or another non-Skyscanner Platform, and we have asked non-Skyscanner Platforms to show our advert to individuals that have expressed an interest in travelling to London, the non-Skyscanner Platforms may categorise you within that group and serve you our advert. Sometimes personal data like your email address or phone number is shared with non-Skyscanner Platforms to enable your data to be linked with other information they collect, to create custom audiences or deliver targeted ads.
You can opt-out of your information being used for ads personalisation on non-Skyscanner Platforms by following the steps set out in the How can I withdraw my consent to the use of cookies and similar technologies? section of this Policy below.

seg-source.mrk:
You might see personalised adverts for Skyscanner or selected Skyscanner partners once you've left the Skyscanner Website or App and are using non-Skyscanner platforms. These adverts may be personalised and served to you based on the information Skyscanner and non-Skyscanner Platforms have collected about you. For example, if you have searched for a flight from Edinburgh to London on Skyscanner or another non-Skyscanner Platform, and we have asked non-Skyscanner Platforms to show our advert to individuals that have expressed an interest in travelling to London, the non-Skyscanner Platforms may categorise you within that group and serve you our advert. Sometimes personal data like your email address or phone number is shared with non-Skyscanner Platforms to enable your data to be linked with other information they collect, to create custom audiences or deliver targeted ads.
You can opt-out of your information being used for ads personalisation on non-Skyscanner Platforms by following the steps set out in the How can I withdraw my consent to the use of cookies and similar technologies? section of this Policy below.

target.mrk:
Voc pode ver anncios personalizados do Skyscanner ou de parceiros selecionados do Skyscanner depois de sair do Site ou do Aplicativo do Skyscanner e usar plataformas que no so do Skyscanner. Esses anncios podem ser personalizados e veiculados com base nas informaes que o Skyscanner e as Plataformas que no so do Skyscanner coletaram sobre voc. Por exemplo, se voc pesquisou um voo de Edimburgo para Londres no Skyscanner ou em outra Plataforma que no do Skyscanner, e pedimos s Plataformas que no so do Skyscanner que mostrem nosso anncio a indivduos que manifestaram interesse em viajar para Londres, as Plataformas que no so do Skyscanner podem categorizar voc nesse grupo e veicular nosso anncio. s vezes, dados pessoais como seu endereo de e-mail ou nmero de telefone so compartilhados com Plataformas que no so do Skyscanner para permitir que seus dados sejam vinculados a outras informaes que coletam, para criar pblicos personalizados ou fornecer anncios segmentados.
Voc pode desativar o uso de suas informaes para personalizao de anncios em Plataformas que no so do Skyscanner seguindo as etapas definidas na seo "Como posso revogar minha autorizao do uso de cookies e tecnologias semelhantes?" desta Poltica abaixo.

file.mtc:id-order: Learn more about opting-in or opting-out of cookies and similar tracking technologies

trans-unit.source: Learn more about opting-in or opting-out of cookies and similar tracking technologies

seg-source.mrk: Learn more about opting-in or opting-out of cookies and similar tracking technologies

target.mrk: Saiba mais sobre como aceitar ou recusar cookies e tecnologias de rastreamento semelhantes

trans-unit.source: If you have any questions regarding this Policy or would like more information about the cookies used on our Website or App, please contact us.

seg-source.mrk: If you have any questions regarding this Policy or would like more information about the cookies used on our Website or App, please contact us.

target.mrk: Caso tenha dvidas sobre esta Poltica ou queira saber mais sobre os cookies usados em nosso Site ou Aplicativo, entre em contato conosco.

file.mtc:id-order: Opt-out via Skyscanner privacy setting in app or on web

trans-unit.source: Opt-out via Skyscanner privacy setting in app or on web

seg-source.mrk: Opt-out via Skyscanner privacy setting in app or on web

target.mrk: Desativar atravs da configurao de privacidade do Skyscanner no aplicativo ou na web

trans-unit.source:
The most effective way to manage Cookies and similar technologies on Skyscanner is to use the privacy controls we provide in our product.
You can control the non-essential Cookies and similar technologies that are used on your device by visiting https://www.skyscanner.net/privacy-settings on web or via the Privacy Settings menu in the Skyscanner App. These settings enable you to opt-out or opt-in to our use of the non-essential Cookies and similar technologies we use to improve your experience or to those that we use to personalise the offers or the advertisements you see.

seg-source.mrk:
The most effective way to manage Cookies and similar technologies on Skyscanner is to use the privacy controls we provide in our product.
You can control the non-essential Cookies and similar technologies that are used on your device by visiting https://www.skyscanner.net/privacy-settings on web or via the Privacy Settings menu in the Skyscanner App. These settings enable you to opt-out or opt-in to our use of the non-essential Cookies and similar technologies we use to improve your experience or to those that we use to personalise the offers or the advertisements you see.

target.mrk:
A maneira mais eficaz de gerenciar cookies e tecnologias semelhantes no Skyscanner usar os controles de privacidade que fornecemos em nosso produto.
Voc pode controlar os cookies no essenciais e tecnologias semelhantes que so usados no seu dispositivo acessando https://www.skyscanner.net/privacy-settings na web ou atravs do menu Configuraes de privacidade no aplicativo do Skyscanner. Essas configuraes permitem que voc desative ou aceite o uso dos cookies no essenciais e tecnologias semelhantes que usamos para melhorar sua experincia ou para aqueles que usamos para personalizar as ofertas ou os anncios que voc v.

trans-unit.source:
Another way to opt out of Cookies and similar technologies is via the settings of the browser or device you are using to access our services. Internet browsers such as Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Opera and Edge have settings that allow you to control the way your information is collected and shared. Typically, these browsers allow you to view all the Cookies they are storing on your device, delete your cache of cookies, and adjust your preferences for future collection. Guides on how to access and use such functionality are available at https://www.aboutcookies.org.
The downside of using browser or device settings to withdraw your consent is that it will have the effect of disabling many of the Cookies and similar technologies that are essential to enabling our services to function the impact of this is that some or all of the features and functionality we offer may stop working. Because of this, we would recommend taking a more targeted approach to withdrawing your consent. For example, if you wanted stop Cookies and similar technologies being used for the purposes of serving you interest-based advertisements, then instead of blocking all Cookies, you could instead opt-out of these via the Privacy Settings in Skyscanner referred to above.
Many browsers and other third parties provide specialised ad-blocking software, 'extensions' or tools that enable you to block the use of all cookies for advertising purposes. If you access our services from an iOS or Android device, you can also control how your information is used for certain purposes such as tracking and advertising via your device settings.
You can also find helpful information about how to manage and limit your exposure to online interest-based advertising more generally across the web at http://optout.aboutads.info, http://optout.networkadvertising.org and http://youronlinechoices.eu. You can use these services to opt-out of the majority of interest-based advertising used by us as well as other websites.

seg-source.mrk:
Another way to opt out of Cookies and similar technologies is via the settings of the browser or device you are using to access our services. Internet browsers such as Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Opera and Edge have settings that allow you to control the way your information is collected and shared. Typically, these browsers allow you to view all the Cookies they are storing on your device, delete your cache of cookies, and adjust your preferences for future collection. Guides on how to access and use such functionality are available at https://www.aboutcookies.org.
The downside of using browser or device settings to withdraw your consent is that it will have the effect of disabling many of the Cookies and similar technologies that are essential to enabling our services to function the impact of this is that some or all of the features and functionality we offer may stop working. Because of this, we would recommend taking a more targeted approach to withdrawing your consent. For example, if you wanted stop Cookies and similar technologies being used for the purposes of serving you interest-based advertisements, then instead of blocking all Cookies, you could instead opt-out of these via the Privacy Settings in Skyscanner referred to above.
Many browsers and other third parties provide specialised ad-blocking software, 'extensions' or tools that enable you to block the use of all cookies for advertising purposes. If you access our services from an iOS or Android device, you can also control how your information is used for certain purposes such as tracking and advertising via your device settings.
You can also find helpful information about how to manage and limit your exposure to online interest-based advertising more generally across the web at http://optout.aboutads.info, http://optout.networkadvertising.org and http://youronlinechoices.eu. You can use these services to opt-out of the majority of interest-based advertising used by us as well as other websites.

target.mrk:
Outra maneira de desativar cookies e tecnologias semelhantes por meio das configuraes do navegador ou dispositivo que voc est usando para acessar nossos servios. Navegadores de Internet como Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Opera e Edge tm configuraes que permitem controlar a maneira como suas informaes so coletadas e compartilhadas. Normalmente, esses navegadores permitem que voc visualize todos os cookies que esto armazenando no seu dispositivo, exclua seu cache de cookies e ajuste suas preferncias para coleta futura. Guias sobre como acessar e usar essa funcionalidade esto disponveis em https://www.aboutcookies.org.
A desvantagem de usar as configuraes do navegador ou dispositivo para retirar sua autorizao que isso ter o efeito de desativar muitos dos cookies e tecnologias semelhantes que so essenciais para permitir que nossos servios funcionem. O impacto disso que alguns ou todos os recursos e funcionalidades que oferecemos podem parar de funcionar. Por isso, recomendamos que voc adote uma abordagem mais direcionada para retirar sua autorizao. Por exemplo, se voc quiser impedir que cookies e tecnologias semelhantes sejam usados para veicular anncios baseados em interesses, em vez de bloquear todos os cookies, voc pode desativ-los por meio das Configuraes de privacidade no Skyscanner mencionadas acima.
Muitos navegadores e outros terceiros fornecem software especializado de bloqueio de anncios, "extenses" ou ferramentas que permitem bloquear o uso de todos os cookies para fins de publicidade. Se voc acessar nossos servios a partir de um dispositivo iOS ou Android, tambm poder controlar como suas informaes so usadas para determinados fins, como rastreamento e publicidade por meio das configuraes do seu dispositivo.
Voc tambm pode encontrar informaes teis sobre como gerenciar e limitar sua exposio publicidade online baseada em interesses de forma mais geral na web em http://optout.aboutads.info, http://optout.networkadvertising.org e http://youronlinechoices.eu. Voc pode usar esses servios para desativar a maioria dos anncios baseados em interesses usados por ns, bem como outros sites.

trans-unit.source: We'll only ever use cookies and similar technologies - such as tags and pixels - for the purposes set out in this Cookie Policy (Policy) and will never use them to inflate or alter the prices you see when searching on Skyscanner or to manipulate demand.

seg-source.mrk: We'll only ever use cookies and similar technologies - such as tags and pixels - for the purposes set out in this Cookie Policy (Policy) and will never use them to inflate or alter the prices you see when searching on Skyscanner or to manipulate demand.

target.mrk: S usaremos cookies e tecnologias semelhantes como tags e pixels para os fins estabelecidos nesta Poltica de Cookies ("Poltica") e nunca os usaremos para inflar ou alterar os preos que voc v ao pesquisar no Skyscanner ou para manipular a demanda.

seg-source.mrk: Used for help and customer support services

target.mrk: Usado para servios de ajuda e suporte ao cliente

trans-unit.source: Improved experience (analytics) cookies and similar technologies

seg-source.mrk: Improved experience (analytics) cookies and similar technologies

target.mrk: Cookies de experincia aprimorada (anlise) e tecnologias semelhantes

trans-unit.source: The following table sets out the cookies used at the date of this Policy to improve your experience and allow Skyscanner to compile reports on Website and App usage. The cookies used will vary depending on the device and/or platform you are using. Where available, we have included a link to opt-out of the use of third-party cookies and on an individual level. You can do that by visiting the link in the table on each device you use to access Skyscanner.

seg-source.mrk: The following table sets out the cookies used at the date of this Policy to improve your experience and allow Skyscanner to compile reports on Website and App usage. The cookies used will vary depending on the device and/or platform you are using. Where available, we have included a link to opt-out of the use of third-party cookies and on an individual level. You can do that by visiting the link in the table on each device you use to access Skyscanner.

target.mrk: A tabela a seguir estabelece os cookies usados na data desta Poltica para melhorar sua experincia e permitir que o Skyscanner compile relatrios sobre o uso do Site e do Aplicativo. Os cookies usados variam de acordo com o dispositivo e/ou plataforma que voc est usando. Quando disponvel, inclumos um link para desativar o uso de cookies de terceiros e em um nvel individual. Voc pode fazer isso acessando o link na tabela em cada dispositivo que voc usa para acessar o Skyscanner.

trans-unit.source: Personalised Advertising cookies and similar technologies

seg-source.mrk: Personalised Advertising cookies and similar technologies

target.mrk: Cookies de publicidade personalizada e tecnologias semelhantes

trans-unit.source: These are the cookies and similar technologies used at the date of this Policy to personalise your ads. Where available, we have also included a link to opt-out of the use of third-party cookies and similar technology on an individual level. You can do that by visiting the link in the table on each device you use to access Skyscanner.

seg-source.mrk: These are the cookies and similar technologies used at the date of this Policy to personalise your ads. Where available, we have also included a link to opt-out of the use of third-party cookies and similar technology on an individual level. You can do that by visiting the link in the table on each device you use to access Skyscanner.

target.mrk: Estes so os cookies e tecnologias semelhantes usados na data desta Poltica para personalizar seus anncios. Quando disponvel, tambm inclumos um link para desativar o uso de cookies de terceiros e tecnologias semelhantes em um nvel individual. Voc pode fazer isso acessando o link na tabela em cada dispositivo que voc usa para acessar o Skyscanner.

trans-unit.source: Skyscanner may also collaborate with other selected brands to understand more about our travelers' interests, for example, by identifying which Skyscanner travelers engage with particular third-party brands.

seg-source.mrk: Skyscanner may also collaborate with other selected brands to understand more about our travelers' interests, for example, by identifying which Skyscanner travelers engage with particular third-party brands.

target.mrk: O Skyscanner tambm pode colaborar com outras marcas selecionadas para entender mais sobre os interesses de nossos viajantes, por exemplo, identificando quais viajantes do Skyscanner se envolvem com marcas de terceiros especficas.
